data.description: I am Nagesh, Front End Developer based in Pune. I have specialized in HTML5, Javascript, Angular, NodeJs SCSS etc. I am always 😍 with cup of ☕, fun with friends, Photography, Trekking, Movies, WebSeries.
data.friendsDescription: I have a  lots of friends specialized in Software Development, Testing, Hardware and Networking, as well as  Hardware Maintenance Support.They always  excited to do new and Innovative things.We always love to give solutions in IT industry that will help  to grow business as well as our technical knowledge.
